Title: Mile Sur Mera Tumhara
Actors: Shabana Azmi, Amitabh Bachchan, Mangalampalli Balamuralikrishna, Mithun Chakraborty
Plot: The national integration video was intended to instill a sense of pride and promote unity amongst Indians, highlighting the different linguistic communities and societies that live in India - India's unity in diversity, so to speak. Mile Sur was telecast for the first time on Independence Day 1988, after the telecast of the Prime Minister's speech from the ramparts of the Red Fort. It quickly captivated India, gaining and maintaining near-anthem status ever since.
